EmailTemplate.subject: SunPower – The Most Powerful Solar: Web Inquiry Response
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Lead.Name},
Thank you for your interest in SunPower, The World’s Standard for Solar.
At SunPower, we work with Partners who are rigorously trained and certified under SunPower's standards. These Partners are located strategically to offer turnkey service where design, installation, and maintenance are all included.
Hence, SunPower does not sell products directly to customers. Nonetheless, please fill out the following so we could refer you to the certified partner assigned to your area.
Kindly provide the following information that we need to provide to our Dealer:
1. Complete physical address (with zip code) of the home where you plan to install a SunPower system. 2. What is your motivation to go solar? 3. How much is your average monthly electric bill (excluding gas)? 4. How long have you owned your home? 5. How soon are you looking to install a SunPower system? 6. Are you looking at other solar providers? 7. How did you hear about SunPower? 8. What is the best time to call you? 9. Who is your utility provider?
For more information, you may visit our website www.sunpowercorp.com or call our Customer Care line at 1-800-SUNPOWER (1-800-786-7693).
Regards,
{!Lead.OwnerFirstName} SunPower Customer Care Team www.sunpowercorp.com 1-800-SUNPOWER
